text: 5. An urn contains 4 red, 6 green, and 10 blue balls. (a) If three balls are drawn with replacement, what is the probability that the balls have three different colours? (b) If three balls are drawn without replacement, what is the probability that they are all the same colour? (c) If three balls are drawn without replacement, what is the probability that they are all blue conditioned on the event that they all have the same colour?
